inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: CT scan showed evidence of acute perforated appendicitis

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: Diagnostic laparoscopy revealed phlegmon with no other abdominal abnormalities

exclusion.label: met
exclusion.evidence: He is now a candidate for emergent laparoscopic appendectomy under general anesthesia

notes: Seventeen-year-old boy with severe migratory pain in the right lower quadrant of his abdomen, nausea and vomiting. Diagnosed with acute perforated appendicitis.
